snippet: Residents are venting their frustration with the Marine Corps presence and the plan to deploy dozens of aircrafts on the island.
abstract: Editorial expresses support for Japanese protesting the deployment of the MV-22 Osprey aircraft at the United States Marine Corps base in Okinawa; notes that the plane is notoriously prone to crashing, and that the United States has an obligation to listen to the concerns of residents who have long opposed its military presence.
lead_paragraph: Residents are venting their frustration with the Marine Corps presence and the plan to deploy dozens of aircrafts on the island.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
